name: Dita Von Teese - The Queen of Glamour

metadata.name: Champagne Taste
metadata.description: Why bathe with water when you can shower in champagne? Luxury has no limits and the modern priestess of excess knows that well. Dita appears as a modern spy, ready to reach the highest levels of glamour in order to complete her mission and save the world from mediocrity. Ali Madhaviâ€™s magic has managed to perfectly capture her ability to entice the viewer into joining her universe of desire. The exquisite use of light, splendid couture and pose, make this art piece simultaneously intimate and worthy of an exhibition.
